title: FLEXIBLE CORDS AND CABLES
fullText:
Flexible cords and cables shall be identified by durable marking at each termination, using colours corresponding to those listed in Table 3.4.
Exception: Alternative colours may be used for flexible cords and cables provided thatâ€”
(a)	the colours used are not green, yellow or green/yellow;
(b)	the colours used are consistent throughout the installation; and
(c)	the function of each conductor is clearly identified at each termination.
